long_description: Carry the slim yet roomy Haiku Drift Shoulder Bag to your favorite coffeehouse or on your next vacation. It's just the right size for an e-reader. Faux-leather trim along the top and unique graphics add style. Main compartment zips shut across the top; internal zip and slip-in pockets. Hidden-zip pocket on the front lets you stash your phone or other item for quick retrieval. Back slip-in pocket. Haiku Drift Shoulder Bag has a detachable, adjustable cross-body shoulder strap. Made of recycled material.
short_description: Carry the slim yet roomy Haiku Drift Shoulder Bag to your favorite coffeehouse or on your next vacation. It's just the right size for an e-reader.
